title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, CodeLlama, and other LLMs runnable via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack adding Open-WebUI, litellm-proxy and Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI (Text User Interface) wrapper around the Ollama CLI with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team providing Generator and Embedding components.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama JS client for easy dependency injection in Node apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image (ollama/ollama) with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama models into channels with threading and DM support.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated list of open datasets fine-tuned for Ollama-compatible GGUF models.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community registry of custom GGUF models optimized for Ollama with download links.
